src:
Apapun yang Terjadi, Manchester United Harus Pulangkan Zlatan Ibrahimovic
01 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Eks pemain Manchester United, Paul Ince mendesak manajemen Manchester United untuk memulangkan Zlatan Ibrahimovic. Ince menilai striker senior itu sangat dibutuhkan kehadirannya di Old Trafford.
Sudah menjadi rahasia umum jika Manchester United berencana membeli striker baru. Hal ini dikarenakan mereka kekurangan stok penyerang setelah ditinggal Romelu Lukaku dan Alexis Sanchez.
Ada beberapa nama yang dirumorkan akan dikejar oleh Manchester United. Salah satunya adalah mereka tertarik untuk merekrut eks pemain mereka, Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
Ince merasa bahwa kepulangan ZLatan ke Old Trafford akan menghadirkan dampak yang besar. "Saya rasa kedatangannya akan disambut gembira oleh para fans," beber Ince kepada Paddy Power.

Baca komentar lengkap eks pemain MU itu di bawah ini.
text:
Whatever Happens, Manchester United must send Zlatan Ibrahimovic back
Nov 1 2019, 21:00 by Bola.net
Former Manchester United player Paul Ince has urged Manchester United management to repatriate Zlatan Ibrahimovic. Ince assessed that the senior striker was needed by his presence at Old Trafford.
It is common knowledge that Manchester United plans to buy a new striker. This is because they lacked the attacker's stock after being left by Romelu Lukaku and Alexis Sanchez.
There are several names rumored to be pursued by Manchester United. One of them is that they are interested in recruiting their former player, Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
Ince feels that ZLatan's return to Old Trafford will have a big impact. "I think his arrival will be welcomed by the fans," Ince told Paddy Power.

Read the full comments of the former MU player below.
